title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 51.6 - Amendment of pleadings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 51.6 - Amendment of pleadings

State Regulations

Any party may amend or supplement a pleading at any time prior to the submission of the hearing officer's report to the commissioner, or to the appropriate board or council, by leave of the hearing officer, if there is no substantial prejudice to any other party. Any party may amend or supplement a pleading at any time prior to a hearing committee's final determination and order pursuant to Public Officers Law, section 230(10), by leave of the hearing officer if there is no substantial prejudice to any other party. Notes

51.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
